CustomField.formula: IF(Payment_Term__c <= 7 && Payment_Term__c >= 0, "Z007", IF(Payment_Term__c <= 15 && Payment_Term__c > 7, "Z015", IF(Payment_Term__c <= 30 && Payment_Term__c > 15, "Z030", IF(Payment_Term__c <= 45 && Payment_Term__c > 30, "Z045", IF(Payment_Term__c <= 60 && Payment_Term__c > 45, "Z060", IF(Payment_Term__c <= 75 && Payment_Term__c > 60, "Z075", IF(Payment_Term__c <= 90 && Payment_Term__c > 75, "Z090", IF(Payment_Term__c <= 120 && Payment_Term__c > 90, "Z120", "") ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Payment Term Code
